name: Into The Abyss (itch) (Michael's Games)
description:
- Find your-self lost inside of the maze. Into The Abyss was originally inspired by the backrooms, we then turned it into something else. Into The Abyss is in the early stages of beta mode. We have a plan on slowly adding newer features.

Controls: MovementWSADPCDoor EnteranceEPC
Networking (Lan) - Supported
